layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 555x16
          text run at (0,0) width 555: "The text below should be left-justified since text-align does not inherit in quirks mode."
      RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,16) size 784x24
        RenderTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 108x24 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
          RenderTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 106x22
            RenderTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 106x18
              RenderTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 102x18 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                RenderText {#text} at (1,1) size 36x16
                  text run at (1,1) width 36: "hello."
